flash.Vector<T>

type
class
metadata
:require
flash10
The Vector class is very similar to Array but is only supported by the Flash Player 10+

Static Methods

inline convert<T, U>(v : Vector<T>) : Vector<U>

inline ofArray<T>(v : Array<T>) : Vector<T>

new(?length : UInt, ?fixed : Bool)
